alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Lapeer; Livingston; Macomb; Oakland; Shiawassee; Wayne (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 10:01PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Lapeer, Wayne, Oakland, southern Macomb, southeastern Shiawassee, northeastern Livingston and southern Genesee Counties through 1045 PM EDT... At 1000 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from Lansing to near Brighton to near Trenton. Movement was northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Taylor, Milford, Wyandotte, Trenton, Grosse Ile and Greenfield Village around 1005 PM EDT. Downtown Detroit, Detroit and Dearborn around 1010 PM EDT. Belle Isle and West Bloomfield around 1015 PM EDT. Grosse Pointe, Swartz Creek and Clarkston around 1020 PM EDT. Pontiac around 1025 PM EDT. Flint, Davison, Oxford and Burton around 1030 PM EDT. Romeo around 1040 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Franklin, Keego Harbor, Melvindale, Waterford, Rankin, Shelby Township, Holly State Recreation Area, Commerce, Utica and Auburn Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
